data.question: What is the chemical formula for 17,20-diiodo-2,3,5,6,8,9,11,12,14,15-hexahydrobenzo[b][1,4,7,10,13,16]tetraoxacyclo-dodecine?

What is the space group for the crystal structure of compound VI?
What method was used to fit the experimental data for cerium cation release profiles in Zr-MOFs?
What is the BET surface area of UiO-67 after exposure to DMF during 0 h–144 h?
What is the percentage of 241Am remaining in the MOF PCN-700+TA after 1 week of exposure to DMF?
What is the crystal system for the compound Ce-18C6?
What is the R-factor for the EXAFS data fitting of Ce@Zr-MOF?
What is the coordination number for Ce−O in the EXAFS data model for Ce@Zr-MOF?

True or False: The double-exponent model was used to describe the leaching kinetics of cerium cations in Zr-MOFs.
True or False: The Weibull model is applicable for describing the dissolution/release process from a solid into solution.
True or False: The second-order model typically describes the dissolution process of a solid material from a matrix cavity into a solvent.
True or False: The Korsemeyer-Peppas model was found to be the best fit for the cerium cation release profiles in Zr-MOFs.
True or False: The intraparticle diffusion model was used to fit the experimental data for cerium cation loading profiles in Zr-MOFs.
True or False: The Elovich model was selected for analysis of the kinetic data for cerium cation adsorption in Zr-MOFs.
True or False: The amount of 241Am loaded into PCN-700+TA was higher than in PCN-700.
True or False: The BET surface area of PCN-700 decreased after the cerium loading process.
True or False: The crystal structure of Ce-18C6 was determined at room temperature.
True or False: The space group for the crystal structure of PCN-700-RT is P42/mmc.
